item.title: Azure Role Assignment Hygiene
item.description:
Introduction Hello, Azure enthusiasts! I'm back again with another insightful blog post. My name is Felipe Binotto, Cloud Solution Architect, based in Australia. Today, we're going to delve into a topic that is often overlooked but is critical to the smooth operation of your Azure environment - Azure Role Assignment Hygiene. I will not cover guest user accounts as my colleague @Bruno Gabrielli has already covered it in detail in this great post.
What is Role Assignment Hygiene Azure Role Assignment Hygiene refers to the practice of regularly reviewing and cleaning up Azure role assignments....
